entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 30 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
